sections.heading: veterans homes; establishment.The Central Nebraska Veterans' Home, the Norfolk Veterans' Home, the Eastern Nebraska Veterans' Home, and the Western Nebraska Veterans' Home are established
sections.text: The State of Nebraska shall maintain the homes as provided in the Nebraska Veterans Services Act.SourceLaws 188

80-315.Nebraska veterans homes; establishment.

The Central Nebraska Veterans' Home, the Norfolk Veterans' Home, the Eastern Nebraska Veterans' Home, and the Western Nebraska Veterans' Home are established. The State of Nebraska shall maintain the homes as provided in the Nebraska Veterans Services Act.

SourceLaws 1887, c. 82, § 1, p. 622;Laws 1889, c. 85, § 1, p. 569;Laws 1891, c. 49, § 1, p. 340;Laws 1901, c. 71, § 1, p. 458;R.S.1913, § 7302;Laws 1919, c. 157, § 1, p. 354;C.S.1922, § 6957;C.S.1929, § 80-301;Laws 1931, c. 153, § 1, p. 412;Laws 1935, c. 172, § 1, p. 627;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 80-301;Laws 1943, c. 211, § 1, p. 696;R.S.1943, § 80-301;Laws 1949, c. 272, § 1, p. 891;Laws 1953, c. 325, § 1, p. 1075;Laws 1959, c. 421, § 1, p. 1417;Laws 1969, c. 753, § 1, p. 2833;Laws 1969, c. 584, § 93, p. 2402;Laws 1971, LB 334, § 1;Laws 1973, LB 33, § 1;Laws 1975, LB 90, § 2;Laws 1979, LB 80, § 112;Laws 1980, LB 184, § 1;Laws 1981, LB 351, § 1;Laws 1991, LB 2, § 23;Laws 1994, LB 1066, § 95;Laws 1994, LB 1194, § 16;R.S.1943, (1996), § 80-301;Laws 1997, LB 396, § 4;Laws 2006, LB 994, § 110;Laws 2017, LB340, § 4;Laws 2024, LB252, § 1.
